name: Cl-wt
body:
# Cl-Wt 

Cl-Wt is a library for web developement inspired on C++ library Wt.

## Usage

See an example application in [helloworld.lisp](https://github.com/trumae/cl-wt/blob/master/examples/helloworld.lisp).

## Dependencies

* hunchentoot
* ironclad
* cl-who
* uuid
* iterate
* css-lite

And for tests:

* cl-test-more

## Installation

Clone the Github repository and load the code in an Common Lisp. The code is tested in SBCL and OpenMCL.
   
## Author
